mapper.select: select style_no, m_no, style_regdate, style_content, count_like, count_comment from (select /*+index_desc(style style_pk) */ rownum rn, style_no, m_no, style_regdate, style_content, count_like, count_comment from style where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}) where rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
select style_no from (select style_no from style order by style_no desc) where rownum=1
mapper.insert: insert into style(style_no, m_no, style_regdate, style_content, count_like, count_comment) values( style_seq.nextval, 11, sysdate, #{style_content}, 0, 0)
